class_710_overground.name: British Rail Class 710M (Overground)
class_710_overground.description: The British Rail Class 710 Aventra is a type of electric multiple unit passenger train built by Bombardier Transportation for use on the London Overground network. The trains are part of Bombardier's Aventra family. The contract to provide 45 four-car trains was awarded in July 2015 and the trains were originally due to enter service in May 2018, although introduction was delayed until May 2019.

briddle_rail_class_320.name: Briddle Rail Class 320 (Regional)
briddle_rail_class_320.description: Class 320 Commutra is an AC Electric Multiple Unit that runs on the regional mainlines.

briddle_rail_class_320_white.name: Briddle Rail Class 320 (Blank)
briddle_rail_class_320_white.description: Class 320 Commutra is an AC Electric Multiple Unit that runs on the regional mainlines.

briddle_rail_class_420.name: Briddle Rail Class 420 (Regional)
briddle_rail_class_420.description: Unlike the Class 320, the Class 420 Commutra is a DC Electric Multiple Unit that runs on high density commuter lines or short regional lines.

briddle_rail_class_420_white.name: Briddle Rail Class 420 (Blank)
briddle_rail_class_420_white.description: Unlike the Class 320, the Class 420 Commutra is a DC Electric Multiple Unit that runs on high density commuter lines or short regional lines.

briddle_rail_class_420_commute.name: Briddle Rail Class 420 (Commute)
briddle_rail_class_420_commute.description: Unlike the Class 320, the Class 420 Commutra is a DC Electric Multiple Unit that runs on high density commuter lines or short regional lines.

briddle_rail_class_400_white.name: Briddle Rail Class 400 (Blank)
briddle_rail_class_400_white.description: The Briddle Rail Class 400 is the perfect train for short commuter branch lines. Sometimes however the trains can be seen running as 3-car variants on low-density commuter lines.

briddle_rail_class_400_commute.name: Briddle Rail Class 400 (Commute)
briddle_rail_class_400_commute.description: The Briddle Rail Class 400 is the perfect train for short commuter branch lines. Sometimes however the trains can be seen running as 3-car variants on low-density commuter lines.

briddle_rail_class_200.name: Briddle Rail Class 200/0 (Regional)
briddle_rail_class_200.description: The Briddle Rail Class 200 is one of the first Diesel Electric multiple units to enter service. It is used primarily on unelectrified regional services.

briddle_rail_class_200_1.name: Briddle Rail Class 200/1 (Regional)
briddle_rail_class_200_1.description: The Briddle Rail Class 200 is one of the first Diesel Electric multiple units to enter service. It is used primarily on unelectrified regional services.

briddle_rail_class_202.name: Briddle Rail Class 202 (Regional)
briddle_rail_class_202.description: Following the success of the Class 200, Briddle Rail ordered new Class 202s to be used on medium-distance journeys. These trains are primarily used on main lines.

briddle_rail_class_203.name: Briddle Rail Class 203 (Regional)
briddle_rail_class_203.description: As the need to replace older slam-door units on rural routes became closer, Briddle Rail ordered a batch of Class 202 lookalikes called the Class 203s to be used on rural services & branch lines.

metrocar.name: Tyne and Wear Metrocar
metrocar.description: The Tyne and Wear Metrocar, also known as the Class 994 is a light rail vehicle operating in the Newcastle, Gateshead, Tynemouth and Sunderland area

metrocar_80s.name: Tyne and Wear Metrocar (80s livery)
metrocar_80s.description: The Tyne and Wear Metrocar, also known as the Class 994 is a light rail vehicle operating in the Newcastle, Gateshead, Tynemouth and Sunderland area

metrocar_rnet.description: The Tyne and Wear Metrocar, also known as the Class 994 is a light rail vehicle operating in the Newcastle, Gateshead, Tynemouth and Sunderland area

stcmetro_mp68.name: STC MP-68 (Matériel roulant sur Pneumatiques 1968)
stcmetro_mp68.description: Es el primer modelo de tren de rodadura neumática del Metro de la Ciudad de México. Fue diseñado y construido por Alstom en Francia.

stcmetro_mp68_original.name: STC MP-68 (Matériel roulant sur Pneumatiques 1968) - Original
stcmetro_mp68_original.description: Es el primer modelo de tren de rodadura neumática del Metro de la Ciudad de México. Fue diseñado y construido por Alstom en Francia.

stcmetro_mp68_presidencial.name: STC MP-68 (Matériel roulant sur Pneumatiques 1968) - Tren presidencial
stcmetro_mp68_presidencial.description: Es el primer modelo de tren de rodadura neumática del Metro de la Ciudad de México. Fue diseñado y construido por Alstom en Francia.

stcmetro_nm73.name: STC NM-73
stcmetro_nm73.description: Es el segundo modelo de tren sobre neumáticos del Metro de la Ciudad de México. Debido a su progresiva antiguedad, el organismo STC-Metro preparó medidas especiales para ampliar esta vida útil a más del 30%.

stcmetro_nm73_caf.name: STC NM-73 - Cabina CAF
stcmetro_nm73_caf.description: Es el segundo modelo de tren sobre neumáticos del Metro de la Ciudad de México. Debido a su progresiva antiguedad, el organismo STC-Metro preparó medidas especiales para ampliar esta vida útil a más del 30%.

stcmetro_nm73_caf_recuperado.name: STC NM-73 - Cabina CAF Recuperado
stcmetro_nm73_caf_recuperado.description: Es el segundo modelo de tren sobre neumáticos del Metro de la Ciudad de México. Debido a su progresiva antiguedad, el organismo STC-Metro preparó medidas especiales para ampliar esta vida útil a más del 30%.

stcmetro_nc82.name: STC NC-82
stcmetro_nc82.description: Es el quinto modelo de tren sobre neumáticos del Metro de la Ciudad de México, fabricado por Bombardier Transportation en Canadá.

stcmetro_nc82_verde.name: STC NC-82 - Naranja/Verde
stcmetro_nc82_verde.description: Es el quinto modelo de tren sobre neumáticos del Metro de la Ciudad de México, fabricado por Bombardier Transportation en Canadá.

stcmetro_nc82_cdmx.name: STC NC-82 - Naranja/Verde CDMX
stcmetro_nc82_cdmx.description: Es el quinto modelo de tren sobre neumáticos del Metro de la Ciudad de México, fabricado por Bombardier Transportation en Canadá.

stcmetro_fm86.name: STC FM-86 (Férreo Mexicano 1986)
stcmetro_fm86.description: Es el primer modelo de tren de rodadura férrea del Metro de la Ciudad de México. Circulan por la Línea A del Metro de la Ciudad de México.

stcmetro_fm86_prototype1_naranja.name: STC FM-86 (Férreo Mexicano 1986) - Prototipo 1 (Naranja)
stcmetro_fm86_prototype1_naranja.description: Este es un tren prototipo de la FM-86 fabricado por Concarril (actual Bombardier México).

stcmetro_fm86_prototype1_blanco.name: STC FM-86 (Férreo Mexicano 1986) - Prototipo 1 (Blanco)
stcmetro_fm86_prototype1_blanco.description: Este es un tren prototipo de la FM-86 fabricado por Concarril (actual Bombardier México).

stcmetro_fm86_prototype2.name: STC FM-86 (Férreo Mexicano 1986) - Prototipo 2
stcmetro_fm86_prototype2.description: Este prototipo es igual que el tren original, pero con las luces arriba del agujero del acople en vez de los lados.

stcmetro_fm86_fm032.name: STC FM-86 (Férreo Mexicano 1986) - "FM.032"
stcmetro_fm86_fm032.description: En esta composición, uno de los vagones motores se le aplicó una librea experimental basada en el FM-95A.

stcmetro_ne92.name: STC NE-92
stcmetro_ne92.description: Es el séptimo modelo de tren sobre neumáticos del Metro de la Ciudad de México, diseñado y construido por CAF en España.

metrocar_dmr.name: DMR T90 Stock
metrocar_dmr.description: DMR T90 Stock, based on Tyne & Wear Metrocar. Used for shorter, rural branches.
